§ Vidzy (Fediverse Software)

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Vidzy** is [[fediverse/software]] focused on **short-form video**, that started its life as a fork of [[fediverse/software/pleroma]].

Being software for a micro-blogging social-media network, **Vidzy** is similar to:

• [[fediverse/software/friendica]],
• [[fediverse/software/gnu-social]],
• [[fediverse/software/gotosocial]],
• [[fediverse/software/loops]],
• [[fediverse/software/mastodon]],
• [[fediverse/software/misskey]],
• [[fediverse/software/pleroma]],
• [[fediverse/software/pixelfed]],
• and others.
